patthana15.46:1.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.46:2.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
